txt.en: 'Ah, I'm warmer already! Thank you, [placeholder]. If you haven't already done so, you should talk to Náth. I'm sure he has some work for you as well.'
The camp-fires in Fellgát have been assembled, but now they need to be set alight.
The camp-fires have been lit, protecting Fellgát from the chill of the mountains.\n\nYou should talk to Dréri.
Dréri has asked you to look around the nearby area for firewood.\n\nYou should collect fallen branches near Fellgát.

'Now that our tents are set up, we need to get the camp-fires ready. The howling wind and high altitude keep it mighty cold here, and it would not do for us to freeze solid in the middle of the night!\n\n'I need you to look for suitable firewood outside the walls of Fellgát. While you do that, I will mark places for you to make the camp-fires.'
Now that you have some firewood, you should build camp-fires in Fellgát.
Dréri has asked you to set up camp-fires in Fellgát to keep the cold away.
